name: Terrence Robinson
story: Terrence Robinson was born and raised in a military family. His father was a retired army officer and his mother was a nurse. Terrence joined the army straight out of high school, starting as an enlisted soldier and eventually being commissioned as an officer. He has served in multiple tours of duty in various conflicts across the world. Though he is unmarried, he is content with his life in the military and takes great pride in his role as an Officer in Parade Dress.
